Container.Name: Jellyfin-Nvidia-CUDA12
Container.Overview: ⚠️ UNSUPPORTED COMMUNITY TEMPLATE ⚠️ - Jellyfin Media Server with full NVIDIA GPU support (CUDA 12.9.1) for hardware transcoding. Configure paths for your system! No support provided.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: ⚠️ REQUIRED: Path to store Jellyfin config and data (e.g., /mnt/user/appdata/jellyfin-nvidia)

Config.Name: Media Path
Config.Description: ⚠️ REQUIRED: Path to your media library (e.g., /mnt/user/media)

Config.Name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
